pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, March 9, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet Meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

The Prime Minister will speak with the leaders of the Assembly of First Nations, Inuit Tapiriit Kanatami, and Métis National Council to discuss Indigenous health.
